argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR+ ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_rpred | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sgnmul | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( sgn ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sgn ` A ) x. ( sgn ` B ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( sgn ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sgn ` A ) x. ( sgn ` B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_rpxrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR* ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_rpgt0d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> 0 < B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_sgnp | |- ( ( B e. RR* /\ 0 < B ) -> ( sgn ` B ) = 1 ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( sgn ` B ) = 1 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( sgn ` A ) x. ( sgn ` B ) ) = ( ( sgn ` A ) x. 1 ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_sgnclre | |- ( A e. RR -> ( sgn ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ax-1rid | |- ( ( sgn ` A ) e. RR -> ( ( sgn ` A ) x. 1 ) = ( sgn ` A ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( sgn ` A ) x. 1 ) = ( sgn ` A ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 9, 13 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( sgn ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( sgn ` A ) ) |
